itemInfo.itemDesc: A type of Hypha acquired from Mushrooms that can be used to obtain Cloud Mushrooms, an Alchemy ingredient, by Farming. You can begin Farming after using a Fence to create a Garden. This produce takes up 1 space in a Garden.\n- How to Obtain: They can be Gathered from Thickets and Cloud Mushrooms using Bare Hands or a Hoe.\n(Right-click to display the closest Fence Exchange location)
